channel.title: Commands and portls tellys
channel.description:
ok i am starting to edit my server... i have changed the color of the hits... i have looked through tutorial guides and none of these have them..... so im wondering.. how do i make commands like ::starter.... ::switch.... stuff like that?
also, im wondering how do i make portals.. the one guide i looked at didnt help =( also i need a guide how to make ancientz tellys go to places

item.title: Commands and portls tellys
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Well I can help you make the portal. Okay open up your Objectspawn.java file and after the last one of these c.makeGlobalObject(id, coordx, coordy, 0, 10);//test add in another one and put in the item id in the first space, then the x coord, then the y coord. It should work if done correctly. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 09:08:13 PM[/size][hr]Ooops then compiler your server, open runserver.bat and log back in

Read full topic
